title: T206 f/s: All SOLD - thank you!
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: T206 f/s: All SOLD - thank you!
posts.post_content:
More T206's FS - SGC graded 50 & 55.  None of the cards appear to have any visible creases or flaws beyond their grade.  Prices are delivered, PayPal regular (add 3%), (payment owed - no add), check or MO.  Most are at/near VCP average.  First PM, email or post.  Commitment to buy supersedes questions.  Thank you!

  * Ferguson, SC350, SGC55 - $65**Sale Pend**
  * Killian (Port), P350, SGC50 - $75 **Sale Pend**
  * Lennox, SC350, SGC60 - $85 **SOLD**
